title: A Mingled Measure: Diaries, 1953-1972
description: This text continues the sequence that established James Lees-Milne as a well-known 20th-century diarist. The author has ceased to work full-time for the National Trust and we now see him in kaleidoscopically varied company, including Colette, Oswald Mosley and John Betjeman.
author: James Lees-Milne
